developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Breadfast is a supermarket app that provides grocery essentials to your doorstep. From dairy, eggs, fresh bread, fruits and vegetables, all the way to household supplies, and specialty coffee, everything that you need is available 24/7 and one click away.

Now in Riyadh, delivering fresh bakeries the next morning.

Our in-house bakeries and groceries are packed fresh, produced daily within our production facilities and delivered fresh to your doorstep. Order all your needs from one user-friendly platform. 

Breadfast delivers to most neighborhoods in Cairo and Giza, Alexandria for same day delivery of groceries, now in Riyadh for next morning delivery of bakeries.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Hey there! We’re instashop, your go-to app for all things shopping, delivered fast and easy. Curious how we make life simpler for you?

With instashop, you can shop from your favourite local supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, bakeries, butcheries, pet shops, and more, all in one place! No more store hopping, we bring them conveniently to your fingertips.

Find the shops you love.
- UAE: From Spinneys, Carrefour, Waitrose, Choithrams & ZOOM to PAUL, Café Bateel, ALBAIK, Gazebo, Allo Beirut, The Body Shop, Toys R Us, and a LOT more! 
- Egypt: From Mahmoud ElFar, Fathallah, Circle K, Spinneys, & Lulu Hypermarket to El Ezaby, El Dahan, Ibn Al Sham, Tortina, Al Fouad, Duke’s, Dog Zone, and others.

Search for your faves or explore new gems (because there’s always room for a new discovery).

Fast and flexible delivery
Need it ASAP? Get your order delivered in as little as 20 minutes (depending on your location). Not in a rush? Schedule it for when it suits you. We’re all about convenience.

Endless variety, premium quality
With over 1,000,000 products, we have everything you need! From snacks and recipe ingredients to household essentials, pharmacy supplies, organic and fresh produce, gifts & toys, pet goodies, irresistible desserts, and more.

What can we deliver? Pretty much EVERYTHING:

- Groceries
- Pharmacy essentials
- Pet supplies
- Flowers
- Fresh produce
- Organic products
- Baby care & toys
- Bakery & cakes
- Beauty & cosmetics
- Perfumes
- Stationery & party supplies
- Home & living items
- Butchery, seafood & BBQ
- Specialty shops
- Food
- Water
- Electronics
- Fitness nutrition
- Home cleaning (operated by JustLife)
- Laundry & dry cleaning (operated by Washmen)

You can also donate to trusted charities and give back to our beloved community. 

Long story short, the rule is simple: if you need it, we’ll deliver it!

Services vary based on location. Please download the app to see what's available near you.

Fire questions: 

Where can you find us? We’re currently serving the United Arab Emirates and Egypt.
Got questions? Reach out to us at contact@instashop.ae.
Loving InstaShop? Take a moment to rate us on the App Store. Thanks for your support, we couldn’t do this without you!

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

KFC Egypt is one of the best fast-food restaurants in Egypt. Find amazing deals & offers on our app and get it delivered at your door-step. Enjoy KFC fried chicken, twister sandwiches and zinger box meals & more all from the comfort of your home!


We have made your meal as safe as ever with our 100% contactless delivery at the comfort of your home or you can takeaway the scrumptious meals from your nearest KFC store. 


We understand the current situation and the need to be home and safe. Call now on our KFC Egypt numbers or download our KFC Egypt app today to order lip-smacking Kentucky fried chicken!
 
*KFC Egypt app takes ordering to the next level, follow just a few steps:  

1. Download the KFC Egypt app,
2. Choose a preferred mode of language,
3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu,
4. Add goodness to your cart,
5. Easy Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest,
6. Pick your preferred mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery,
7. Select location and provide a delivery address,
8. Hassle free proceed to check out and make the payment,
9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery,
10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 



Why you should use KFC App:

Takeaway:
While you are out and about in the city, take away your delicious food from any nearest KFC Egypt burger restaurant by ordering from the food delivery app.   

Smart Car Hop:                                                                                                                                
Experience 100% Contactless and hassle-free Car Hop services. For our customers, we bring the safest contactless delivery for your car parked on our premises.

Midnight delivery: 
Bookmark our KFC Egypt chicken restaurant for all the late-night cravings. Have a look at our KFC menu & we will rush to you with delicious burger meals even at midnight. This is available at select locations only.

My Account:
Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to login with ease.

Easy payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards, etc.) at your fingertips, it is hassle-free to pay for your order now.

Exclusive KFC Menu:  
Order from the wide range of - KFC super bucket meals, Zinger box meals, twister sandwiches, Combos for one or for sharing, chicken fillet burgers and much more. Do not forget to look for our Sides & Desserts section. 

Amazing Offers: 
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that it leaves you wanting for more. Get special rewards on the KFC deals app with your order. 


Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 01200003556/51 For more details, please log into https://www.egypt.kfc.me//?lng=en

Mystery Bag is your go-to app for saving money on delicious food, products while making a positive impact on the environment. We connect you with surplus, high-quality meals, products from restaurants, bakeries, and markets, helping reduce waste and supporting a more sustainable future.

Key Features:
Affordable Meals: Get access to delicious meals, products at discounted prices.
Easy-to-Use Interface: Browse available Mystery Bags in your area, reserve your bag, and pick it up hassle-free.
Support Sustainability: Every bag you save helps reduce waste and contributes to a greener planet.
Diverse Options: From fresh bakery items to skin care products, discover a variety of surplus items near you.
Real-Time Notifications: Stay updated with alerts when new Mystery Bags become available in your area.
Join the movement to fight waste and enjoy affordable, high-quality meals & products. Download Mystery Bag today and start saving—both your wallet and the planet will thank you!

With the convenience of shopping at home, our marketplace is at your fingertips. Whatever your time schedule and wherever you are, we've got a delivery slot for you. Shop your groceries at the same price as in store and with offers you can't beat.

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Mrsool is one of the largest delivery platforms in the kingdom. Mrsool is a unique on-demand experience earned the highest user ratings among all the other large delivery apps. It’s the first and the best Saudi App that delivers everything from all types of stores and restaurants across, covers all areas in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Mrsools’ services expansion reached to Egypt and Bahrain and soon to other countries in the region.

Mrsool is not just a delivery app that deliver orders, Mrsool is like your brother that is always close to you no matter what you order. It does not only deliver food from all restaurants, it’s also deliver Gaz, Water, Car parts, Groceries, clothes, Accessories and even if you forgot something somewhere you can ask Mrsool to bring it to your place.   

Mrsool Advantages:
-	Delivers Everything.
-	Send whatever you want to any place.
-	Use Mrsool ordering bot for easier order process.
-	You can review your old orders and re-order them with just a click.
-	You can order from multiple places in the same order.
-	Covers all restaurants and stores in KSA.
-	Always has offers and promotions available.
-	Pay the way you prefer.
-	Live and direct chat with the driver.
-	Accept the delivery fee you want.

And if you want to earn extra money, Join Mrsool and start delivering orders.

It’s now easier with Seoudi! Shop all your favorite groceries and household needs online smoothly with one click of a button. 

A Wide Assortment of Egyptian & International Brands 

More than 15,000 assorted products are available online, starting from fresh vegetables, fruits, dairy products, deli, butchery, bakery, kitchen and household essentials, as well as small appliances. 

Innovative Solutions for Premium Quality 

Freshness is guaranteed within all our products because we strive to maintain high food quality & good taste. In addition, all products are delivered right to your doorstep in the fastest way possible. 

An Exceptional & Unique Shopping Experience 

Because Seoudi is your favorite place to shop, we are keen on offering you the best online shopping experience for a higher satisfaction level and all day round service. We take your orders 24/7.   

Fresh Food Experts Since 1938 
 
Quality is in the core of our work. Therefore, Seoudi’s team of chefs, bakers, and food handlers are keen on maintaining the quality and safety of our special products, and preparing them with love and perfection. And with our customization feature, you can pick your favorite cuts, marination, and specific weights from the application the same way you do at the branch. 

Fast Delivery & Order Tracking Feature 

As soon as you place your order on Seoudi’s application, you can easily start tracking it starting from the preparation phase, any changes you make within the order, and the delivery until the order finally arrives at your doorstep in the fastest way possible. 

Discover Top Deals & Multiple Payments Methods 

A world of unbeatable offers and discounts is waiting for you to discover on Seoudi’s application. Order and choose your preferred and safe payment method, whether through online credit or debit card payments or through cash or card upon delivery.
City Crepe is a new app that enables customers to explore City Crepe's products and order online through it.

Looking to get the best caffeine fix at the best value from Cilantro? Look no further than Cilantro’s ordering and rewards app!

1) Order and Pay

Customize and place your order, pay, and pick it up from a nearby store without any hassle. No more waiting in long lines! Plus, you can save your favorite drinks and reorder them in a flash.

2) Earn Beans & Redeem Rewards

Join Cilantro Rewards and earn Beans with almost every purchase. Collect those Beans and cash them in for free drinks, food, and other cool rewards. Oh, and did we mention you can use your beans however you want, whenever you want? Awesome, right?

3) Find a Store

Need your Cilantro fix? Just open the app and locate the nearest Cilantro stores. You can check their hours and see what cool amenities they have, all on your phone. So easy!

Download the Cilantro app today and start enjoying the perks of easy coffee ordering. No more lines, just pure coffee bliss. Get your caffeine game on point with Cilantro!

 *At participating stores. Restrictions apply.

Welcome to Kitch - Your Ultimate Cooking Companion!

Are you tired of endlessly scrolling through websites, blogs, and social media to find the perfect recipe for your next meal? Do you struggle with deciding what to cook every day? Look no further—Kitch is here to revolutionize your cooking experience!

Kitch is your one-stop platform for discovering and accessing the best recipes from your favorite food bloggers, chefs, and cooking influencers. Whether you’re an experienced home cook or a beginner in the kitchen, Kitch makes meal planning easier, more enjoyable, and more efficient than ever before.

Why Choose Kitch?

Kitch is designed to streamline your cooking journey with a user-friendly interface, advanced search options, and personalized recommendations. Our app helps you find the perfect meal for any occasion, whether you’re cooking a quick breakfast, preparing a family dinner, or hosting a special gathering.

Key Features:

1. Easy Recipe Discovery

Browse an extensive collection of recipes curated from top food bloggers and professional chefs.

Search by cuisine, meal type, dietary preferences, ingredients, or cooking time.

Discover trending and seasonal recipes tailored to your tastes.

2. Personalized Cooking Experience

Save your favorite recipes for quick access.

Create custom collections based on meal categories or dietary needs.

Get personalized recipe recommendations based on your cooking history and preferences.

4. Step-by-Step Cooking Instructions

Follow detailed, easy-to-understand step-by-step instructions.

Watch video tutorials from expert chefs for additional guidance.

Access tips and tricks to enhance your cooking skills.

Who is Kitch for?

Busy professionals: Save time with quick and easy recipes tailored to your schedule.

Home cooks: Expand your culinary skills with expert-backed recipes and tutorials.

Health-conscious individuals: Find meals that fit your dietary needs and fitness goals.

Food enthusiasts: Explore diverse cuisines, unique dishes, and trending food creations.

Families: Plan and cook meals that everyone in the household will love.

How Kitch Stands Out

Unlike traditional recipe websites, Kitch brings all your favorite food bloggers and chefs into one convenient platform. Say goodbye to multiple bookmarks and endless tabs—Kitch centralizes the best cooking content, making it easier than ever to find, save, and cook the recipes you love.

Join the Kitch Community Today!

Cooking should be fun, stress-free, and inspiring. Kitch is here to make your meal preparation effortless while introducing you to new flavors and cooking techniques. Download Kitch today and transform the way you cook!

Download Now & Start Cooking!

Delivery, Takeaway & Dine-In – Roma Pizza To Go Makes It Easy!
Roma Pizza To Go is Egypt’s local pizza app built to bring you the best experience, whether you want delivery to your door, a quick takeaway, or a dine-in order ready when you arrive.
Enjoy authentic, freshly baked pizza at affordable prices with just a few taps. The Roma To Go app is designed for pizza lovers who value great quality, fast service, and convenience wherever they are.
Key Features:
•⁠  ⁠Easy Online Ordering – Choose delivery, takeaway, or dine-in pickup.
•⁠  ⁠Full Menu Access – Explore all our pizzas: chicken, seafood, and classic meat options, plus sides and desserts.
•⁠  ⁠Exclusive Offers – App-only deals and discounts to save more.
•⁠  ⁠Real-Time Delivery Tracking – Know exactly when your pizza will arrive.
•⁠  ⁠Multiple Payment Options – Cash on delivery, credit card, or mobile wallet.
•⁠  ⁠Order History – Quickly reorder your favorites any time.
•⁠  ⁠User-Friendly Design – Smooth, simple, and intuitive experience.
Download now and satisfy your pizza cravings anywhere, any way you want!

Millions of people around the world ask the same question everyday “What will I eat today?” and we make answering this question as simple as a click of a button!

Browse over 6000+ restaurants and thousands of visualized dishes in Egypt to discover & order the food you love. Whether you’re looking for delivery or dine-out restaurants, discover food by the dish you’re craving with specially curated food photos to visualize your next meal.

Download the app now and enjoy the 3etra experience

Food. Groceries. And more, delivered in minutes!
From your favorite takeout to daily essentials, Ninja is the fastest 24-hour restaurants and grocery delivery service you can count on at the price you want with the variety everyone’s looking for.

Shop better. Eat better. Live better.

Start off with a reward: Love gifts? Get FREE delivery on your first order!
5,000+ Restaurants: Order your favorite cuisine and treat yourself to our daily exclusive offers. 
15,000+ products to choose from: From old favorites and household staples to new restaurants and items you never knew existed, we’ve got it all. And more!
24/7 deliveries: Whether you’re an early bird or night owl, our round-the-clock delivery service will give you what you want when you want it.  
Coffee, tea  & more: Get your daily dose of caffeine delivered and choose from our refreshingly fresh juices, sodas and more. 
Follow your order from the get-go: Track it all from the source to your front door in real time.  
Faster than you can say Ninja: We have our very own riders who’ll  deliver whatever  you order in 30 minutes (or less).
Tap into budget-friendly buys: We’ve got what you want  at the price tag you love! 
Paying is a breeze: We accept all major debit and credit cards and various other payments depending on your location. 

Your favorite cuisines delivered in minutes
5,000+ restaurants choices
Exclusive daily offers on what you crave 

One tap gets you the fastest delivery of grocery! Our diverse product range includes:

Food & drink 
►	Beverages & refreshments: Coffees, teas, juices and a range of mineral water brands.
►	Fresh foods & freshly baked: Fresh meats, poultry, fruits, veggies, bread and baked goods.
►	Dairy & frozen foods: Milk, eggs, cheese, ice creams and frozen meals.
►	Pantry supplies: Oil, flour, pasta, rice, grains and other culinary must-haves. 
►	Health-centric choices: Variety of nutritious and organic snacks, nuts, seeds and more.

Home & you 
►	Baby things: Baby formula, food and care products plus diapers, wipes and more.
►	Beauty Corner: Lenses, lashes, nails, perfumes and specialized skincare and makeup products. 
►	Home cleaning: Cleaning supplies, laundry products and other household staples.
►	Personal care: Personal hygiene, skincare and wellness products.
►	Lifestyle essentials: Electronics and mobile accessories, toys, stationary and other necessary knick knacks. 
►	Fitness center: Protein shakes and bars, gym gear, supplements and other essentials for gym bodies. 
►	Pet care: Nutritious food, toys, grooming products and more for dogs, cats and more.

We’re anywhere you are
Well, that’s the aim! Ninja launched in Saudi Arabia – covering the entire country - and has expanded  its super fast grocery delivery services to Qatar, Bahrain and soon, the  remaining GCC. The reason why we’re doing this? Like you, we like to get things done fast and right. And nothing beats getting delicious food and high-quality buys at lightning speed. 

Experience Ninja for yourself. Download the Ninja App now and get a FREE delivery on your first order!

developer: Istidamat Albarakah Information Technology Company, LLC
description:
Save Meals. Enjoy Deals. Share the Barakah

Barakah connects you with surplus meals from top restaurants, cafés, and bakeries — fresh, delicious, and up to 70% off every day!

Why You’ll Love Barakah
- Discover great meals for less.
- Follow your favorite spots and get instant updates on surplus meals nearby.
- Explore Member Experiences—see what others got, share your finds, and discover hidden gems from the Barakah community.
- Send a Gift Voucher—share blessings with friends and family, and let them enjoy a meal full of Barakah. 
- Pay easily with Apple Pay, Mada, or credit card.

How It Works
Restaurants and cafés sometimes end their day with perfectly fresh meals that just didn’t sell.
Barakah gives these meals a second chance—offering them to you at up to 70% off.
You save money, reduce waste, and enjoy good food that deserves to be shared.


Available in all major cities in KSA. 
Want to see us in your city? Follow us on social media and send us a direct message of where you would like us to come next!

Don't miss out on our 100% fresh deals! Download the app now and enjoy blessings in every bite.


Follow us for sustainability tips, new restaurants, exclusive offers, and community stories!

Instagram - @barakahapp
Twitter - @barakahapp
TikTok - @barakahapp
